$BTCTitle: Symbolism vs. Overreaction
Let‚Äôs be clear about what actually happened. A few European countries sent small, symbolic military teams to Greenland as a diplomatic gesture of support for Danish sovereignty. It wasn‚Äôt an act of aggression toward the United States, nor an economic move. It was political signaling ‚Äî perhaps unnecessary, but peaceful in intent.
Trump, however, chose to weaponize that gesture. Instead of responding through diplomacy, he retaliated with a 10% tariff against allies, framing them as adversaries for simply standing behind international norms. That reaction isn‚Äôt strength ‚Äî it‚Äôs disproportionate and reckless.
Markets don‚Äôt panic over symbolism. They panic when world leaders turn symbolic politics into economic punishment. By targeting allies with tariffs over a diplomatic gesture, Trump is injecting instability into trade relations and trust within NATO itself.
Europe‚Äôs move may have been clumsy. Trump‚Äôs response is destabilizing. And when politics becomes ego-driven rather than strategic, financial markets always pay attention.

$BTC BTC 30m Setup: Bullish Trend Continuation & FVG Re-Entry

Today we are zooming into the 30-minute timeframe on Bitcoin (BTC) to find a precision entry.

The market has been aggressively bullish, but as smart traders, we do not chase green candles. We wait for the price to come to us.

The Technical Breakdown
As marked on the chart, the lower timeframe structure has aligned perfectly with the bulls:

CHOCH (Change of Character): We saw the initial shift in momentum when price broke the last structural high. This confirmed the buyers were stepping back in.

BOS (Break of Structure): The trend was confirmed with a strong break above the recent highs, printing a new Higher High. This tells us the flow is decisively Up.

The Setup: The "Reload" Zone
Price left behind a significant inefficiency during the rally. We are looking at the Green Zone (~93,000 level) for our next opportunity.

Unmitigated FVG (Fair Value Gap): There is a clear imbalance where price moved too fast. The market often acts like a magnet to these areas to "fill" the gap.

Bullish OB Confluence: Directly below this FVG sits the Order Block (the origin of the move). This confluence makes it a high-probability support level.

The Game Plan
We are currently waiting for a healthy correction (Retracement).

The Wait: Let price drift down into the Green FVG Zone.

The Trigger: Watch for a reaction or a lower-timeframe reversal pattern (like a 5m CHOCH) inside this zone.

The Target: Once mitigated, we expect the bullish trend to resume, targeting the recent highs and potentially higher (as indicated by the white arrow).

Summary:

Trend: Bullish (30m).

Entry Zone: The Unmitigated FVG.

Invalidation: If price smashes through the OB below the FVG with strong volume.

$BTC Title: Bitcoin is not money, it's a voucher. Why I trust Gold while Crypto is a game for Whales.
Today, everyone is a "crypto investor." People pour their last savings into Bitcoin, hoping for a miracle. But let‚Äôs use our brains and look at the facts. Satoshi Nakamoto, whoever he was, didn‚Äôt create a "magic piggy bank." He created a tool for fast value transfer, bypassing the banks.
The Satoshi Mystery and the Voucher System
Why did Bitcoin‚Äôs creator vanish? Most likely, he understood: he was building a technology that breaks the banking monopoly on transfers. Bitcoin is essentially a digital voucher for moving funds globally. The creator himself pointed out that this is a payment system, not a long-term store of value.
Many believe Satoshi is alive, waiting to cash out his 1 million coins. But the truth is, Bitcoin will grow only until people realize its true nature ‚Äî the nature of a temporary voucher.
Crypto is Pure Randomness
Don‚Äôt be fooled: the crypto market is a massive game where whales eat "hamsters." It‚Äôs wild risk. Today your tokens are worth millions; tomorrow they might vanish. Yes, you can speculate, but building your life's foundation on it is madness. Only enter crypto with money you are prepared to lose.
The Only Real Wealth ‚Äî Gold
For centuries, gold has been the only true measure of wealth. Governments have offered paper, stocks, and bonds for years, blinding people with new "saving" methods. Why? So they can hoard the world‚Äôs gold while the masses collect paper.
Gold will always be the priority. It is the physical energy of the Earth. It cannot be "printed" or deleted from the network with one click.
My Advice:
If you want freedom ‚Äî keep your country's fiat for living and Gold for your future. Use crypto as a tool for quick maneuvers, but don't turn it into an idol. Don't let the whales eat your resources. Be smarter. Be like Gold ‚Äî eternal and calm.

1/ General Prover

This system is the cryptographic core of LayerEdge. It recursively aggregates many zk-proofs into a single succinct proof, drastically reducing verification overhead and making large-scale zk-verification feasible on Bitcoin. 
2/ LayerEdge uses specialized aggregation circuits and recursive composition to compress proofs in a tree structure. Individual proofs are verified at the leaves, aggregated step by step, and reduced to one final proof that represents the validity of the entire batch.
3/ Computation is intentionally shifted to provers. Provers handle recursion, curve operations, and hashing, while verifiers only check one small aggregated proof. This design enables low-cost verification by Light Nodes and Bitcoin settlement layers.
4/ With parallel aggregation, optimized circuits, and strong soundness guarantees, the General Prover / Verifier System turns LayerEdge into a universal zk-verification fabric, enabling scalable, trustless, and cost-efficient computation secured by Bitcoin.

Digital Asset Treasury Firms Spent $49B to Buy $BTC   and Crypto in 2025.     Digital asset treasury companies poured more than $49 billion into Bitcoin and crypto through 2025, according to CoinGecko‚Äôs latest annual report.     Per the report, these firms emerged as major buyers even while the crypto market struggled through one of its toughest cycles since the 2022 bear market. For context, the global crypto market dropped 7.85% in 2025, marking the first annual decline since 2022.     However, most of these losses emerged in the fourth quarter of 2025, with the year recording periods of price surges across multiple months. When the market saw bullish momentum, these Digital Asset Treasury (DAT) firms deployed capital, but the trend slowed in Q4.     CoinGecko‚Äôs report shows that crypto failed to carry its earlier momentum into 2025. The total market value dropped nearly 8% year-over-year and ended the year near $3 trillion.     The sharpest damage came in the last three months of the year, when the market shed almost a quarter of its value. Notably, a liquidation wave of roughly $19 billion in October accelerated the drop shortly after total market value briefly reached a record high near $4.4 trillion.      While gold and silver saw gains, Bitcoin could not keep up, dropping more than 6% last year. However, digital asset treasury companies stole the show.      These firms spent at least $49.7 billion buying Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other tokens during the year. Nearly half of the spending came in the third quarter, when several new treasury vehicles launched and immediately deployed heavy capital into the market.     Their activity helped push institutional ownership to a new scale, giving treasuries control of more than 5% of both the Bitcoin and Ethereum supply by year-end. The Crypto Basic recently confirmed that the top 100 companies holding BTC have accumulated 5.2% of the asset‚Äôs supply.
